content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-46.5, -123.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-46.5, -122.5) connecting the offshore pump
- Steam Engine at Position (-40.5, -113.5)
- Small Electric Poles at various positions attempting to connect the steam engine to the power network

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0) with iron plates being produced
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) storing iron plates
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity, intended to move items from the furnace to the chest

### Miscellaneous
- Lab with no power, inputting automation science packs
- Several Pipe Groups at various positions, mostly empty and not connected to any fluid systems
- An Electricity Group with poles at various positions, currently not providing voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Ensure that the target position for connecting pipes is unoccupied before attempting to connect. Remove any existing entities if necessary.

### Errors when Connecting to Power Network
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities to the power network.

### Errors when Refueling Entities
- Ensure that the second argument when refueling is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position.

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Check that the target position for placing an entity is unoccupied. Remove any existing entities at that position before placing a new one.

### Insufficient Materials for Crafting
- Ensure you have enough materials in your inventory to craft the desired items before attempting to craft.
